entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
